text: Alan Wray Tudyk (born March 16, 1971) is an American actor. He played Hoban "Wash" Washburne in Firefly, Doc Potter in 3:10 to Yuma and as Dutch in Transformers: Dark of the Moon. On voice acting, he voiced Lenny in Ice Age and other Disney characters in each movies and television. He is also known for his prominent role in Moana as Heihei, Moana's loyal pet chicken. Tudyk was born in El Paso, Texas.Alan Tudyk. TVGuide.com Tudyk was raised in Plano, Texas. He studied at Plane Senior High School, Lon Morris High School, and at the Juilliard School.Alan Tudyk Biography. Yahoo!
